Payment to the worker will be paypal, so both profiles will need to be linked to their own personal paypal account. It will also need to be setup so that I'd take 5% of the transaction. There would be more details to discuss, but I'd want a backend that could monitor/report all the jobs/transactions taking place. The flow of the site is attached.

desc: differences between cellphones and smartphones ..Most phones on the market can do all of those things, so most of the cell phones out there are considered smartphones. ... Like I mentioned above, a mobile phone (i.e. cell phone or smartphone) is a device that can make calls. iPods cannot make phone calls like a regular phone, so they are not the same.A smartphone's features is usually more oriented towards mobile phone options than the PDA-like features. There is no industry standard for what defines a smartphone, so any mobile device that has more than basic cellphone capabilities can actually be filed under the smartphone category of [url removed, login to view] 2, 2008
title: differences between cellphones and smartphones

desc: Cashtrack is a lending platform to be deployed on web, mobile and in kiosksIt aims at  connecting investors or lenders looking for high returns with profiled creditworthy borrowers looking for short term personal loans use of salaried individuals employed in pre-screened employers and valid bank accountsLoans originates from direct marketing [offline] or online. Offline loans requests are uploaded by staff or affiliates, processed by Risk Managers in a three level process. Once approved, loans request are shared for partners to invest.Partners can be corporate or individuals who will have  a dashboard and wallet. They can elect for site to manage their investment or elect to privately manage their investmentsWhen they elect loan for investment in a shopping cart like operation, they are requested to fund their wallets for cash equivalent of the total investment.Wallet is funded and cash disbursed,Monthly EMIs less Site commissions are credited to Wallet. User can elect to withdraw or re-invest.Site charges Partners commission which is a rate on interest earned on investment and charges the borrower a flat fee for account management.
title: Responsive Website (Mobile and Desktop) - 05/11/2017 06:27 EST

desc: The idea is the following:Functionality: We have an embedded device that acts as wireless access point (WiFi), DHCP and TCP server. We want to send data to it via TCP socket from a mobile phone. That is why we need an Android application that automatically connects to the AP upon opening.Design: The app needs to have 2 tabs in the UI.Tab 1: Four buttons named ('1',' 2', '3', '4'). The on-click action should be opening a client TCP socket to the TCP server and sending byte array.Tab 2: Config - where we specify the SSID, WPA2 password, server IP address for the connection (as string fields).At the end we will need a brief description of  the TCP socket part - so that we can adjust the values in the byte array as per our needs.
title: Android Application that automatically connects to AP

desc: I need an app developed that is to allow our company to control what programs our employees access when on company tablets and computers.I need an app that has two levels of users: admin users and standard users .USER EXPERIENCEThe app needs to be such that when it is downloaded to a device, no one can access the device without logging into the app (like another windows login page).   When they login, nothing special appears, just normal windows or apple desktop, with an app icon that the employee can click and look at their "profile" which shows their status, and a list of programs that are locked out.once logged into the app and into windows/apple desktop any programs that are "locked out" by admin can not be opened or used unless the lock is removed by admin.Locked out programs need to be able to be clicked, and "send temporary unlock request" popup appear, and when clicked the app will send a notification to the cellular device of an admin user.ADMIN EXPERIENCEThe admin needs to be that when they open a device, and log into the app login window (the secondary windows login to access the desktop) they have no programs locked out, ONLY when users are logged in are there any locked out programs.The admin needs to be so that if they are logged into the app and looking at windows desktop/apple desktop they can click the app icon and go to their profile page, which shows a list of all workers, and when the workers name is clicked, the workers profile is shown, with a list of locked out programs.When looking at a workers profile, and the list of locked out programs, the admin is able to add new locked out programs, remove locks from programs, and to give "temporary unlock" status to programs; with a timer option (unlock for? 30 mins, 1 hour, 4 hours, 24 hours).The purpose is to ensure that only certain employees can access sensitive data, and essential programs.   While also giving us the flexibility to include workers in certain projects if needed, by allowing them to access the programs being used, and open the files being worked on.
title: App to manage employee access of programs.  Program Lockout app.

desc: sWe need a very Simple App that will allow our granite fabrication company to:1. Record first contacts (usually by phone but sometimes in person) with potential countertop clients2. Schedule first appointments (for measurement and pricing) with clients after initial contact is made3. Schedule appointment for our designer to meet new clients at the stone yard to pick out granite4. Schedule time (by week) for our fabrication manager to visit the clients' property and do templates5. Schedule day and approximate time (2-hour window) for installation of the granite countertops6. Schedule a day and time for us to visit the completed job, take pics, and collect for the workIn addition, it would be very helpful to have reminders which would flag us to call clients periodically with updates and info between the time they become customers and the day of installation. We would also like a "tickler" file to renew contacts with potential clients who are not yet ready to hire us.We would like the various customer-contacts to be color coded on a calendar accessible to sales, design, and fabrication/installation personnel on their android phone and tablets, as well as on our iPad used for drawing/pricing the countertop designs/layouts in the CounterGo program (which we access online). In other words, we want all people involved in the project, from first contact to collection, to be able to look at their Android phones or the design iPad and be able to see the same info on any client to know what progress has been made and what remains to be done, with day, date, time, etc.The app has to be extremely user-friendly, for people who know their smart phones very well but are more accustomed to working with their hands!
title: iphone android app

desc: Hello, I would like to develop a Bluetooth app for both Android and iOS that would allow me to control the colors of an LED just like the examples below:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]However I would need help in selecting the smallest PCB/board possible and anything else needed as I have no experience in developing a project like this.In addition to working on both platforms, it should be very simple to use with "pick color", "brightness" and "on/off" functions. The app will also serve as a conversion funnel for my other app, so it will also need a swipeable image at the bottom with a hyperlink.I have no idea on budget, but you can give me your price after you get any other details you would need from me.Thanks and cheers!-SteveHello, I would like to develop a Color Picker app for (Android and iOS) that would allow me to control the colors of an LED via Bluetooth just like the examples below:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]I would need help in selecting the smallest PCB/board and multicolor LEDs possible (and anything else needed) as I have no experience in developing a project like this.In addition to working on both platforms, it should be very simple to use with "pick color", "brightness" and "on/off" functions. The app will also serve as a conversion funnel for my other app, so it will also need a swipeable image (or two) at the bottom with a hyperlink. I can provide all images, links, etc.Please provide a bid, or reach out if you need more details.Thanks and cheers!-Steve
title: Bluetooth Color Picker App
